Installation
============

From Sources
------------

.. highlight:: bash

Get Mercurial repository from https://bitbucket.org/klorenz/ctxvar::

    $ hg clone https://bitbucket.org/klorenz/ctxvar

And run python installation::

    $ python setup.py install
